channel.title: Alcoholics DB System Message Shows Twice
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was Alcoholic. I debauched a player. The system message for debauch showed Twice.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I am Alcoholic. I debauch a player. The system message for debauch shows once.
#### Steps to reproduce: Play as Drunk, be converted, debauch a player.
#### Comments: I've been on the receiving end of this a few times, ie seeing the system message twice as the debauchee, and it has caused me to go huh? I haven't yet been the debauchER, but now that I know this bug, I will be able to identify the alcoholic based on this debauch double message every time.

item.title: Alcoholics DB System Message Shows Twice
item.dc:creator: w1ngz
item.description:
What happened?

I was Alcoholic. I debauched a player. The system message for debauch showed Twice.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I am Alcoholic. I debauch a player. The system message for debauch shows once.

Steps to reproduce:

Play as Drunk, be converted, debauch a player.

Comments:

I’ve been on the receiving end of this a few times, ie seeing the system message twice as the debauchee, and it has caused me to go huh?
I haven’t yet been the debauchER, but now that I know this bug, I will be able to identify the alcoholic based on this debauch double message every time.
